fields_of_interest: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: The main focus is employment policy and education policy and the new skills agenda.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
To start a dialogue with the European Institutions in order to raise the competencies level of all Europeans. The goal is to facilitate a working force across Europe with the right competencies for the future of work. 
 
FA represents the employers in the financial sector in Denmark.
industry_forums: European Banking Federation and the EU’s Insurance Sectoral Social Dialogue Committee.
